="Random values and Google Sheets formulas! ðŸŽ²

column3:
SpreadsheetMemo fully supports '''Google Sheets formulas'''.
 You can make your questions and answers dynamic, for example, to generate random values or perform '''automatic calculations'''.
 
 Try building your own formulas - they will generate new values each time you start a new lesson!
